message:
Thanks for the Really awesome posts Stephan.

I have an Application where I need to process nodes of the XML, processing is mix CPU and IO. I used Task.Run to run them in Parallel as I had not ready your blog by then. My approach was to start processing by using Task.Run and once all tasks are created Wait using Task.WaitAll. Now, I understand that using Parallel class would have been better. What are the disadvantages of current approach?
